columns.description: Number of review you will see today (new, review and learning)
columns.name: today

columns.description: Cards you'll see today which are not new card
columns.name: cards seen today

columns.description: Cards in learning (either new cards you see again, or cards which you have forgotten recently. Assuming those cards didn't graduate)
columns.name: learning card

columns.description: Cards in learning which are due now
columns.name: learning now

columns.description: Review cards which are due today (not counting the one in learning)
columns.name: review due

columns.description: Review cards you will see today
columns.name: review today

columns.description: Cards that have never been answered. Neither buried nor suspended.
columns.name: unseen

columns.description: Unseen cards you will see today, not buried nor suspended. (what anki calls new cards)
columns.name: new today

columns.description: number of suspended cards, (cards you will never see unless you unsuspend them in the browser)
columns.name: suspended

columns.description: Number of cards in the deck
columns.name: cards

columns.description: Number of cards/notes in the deck
columns.name: notes/cards

columns.description: Number of notes in the deck
columns.name: notes

columns.description: Number of cards reviewed, with interval at least 3 weeks/less than 3 weeks
columns.name: mature/young

columns.description: Number of cards reviewed, not yet due
columns.name: undue

columns.description: Number of cards reviewed, with interval at least 3 weeks
columns.name: mature

columns.description: Number of cards reviewed, with interval less than 3 weeks,
columns.name: young

columns.description: Number of marked note
columns.name: marked

columns.description: Number of time you saw a question from this deck
columns.name: repeated

columns.description: Percent bar to do today
columns.name: bar

columns.description: Percent bar showing the decks's repartition
columns.name: bar

columns.description: Review cards which are due tomorrow
columns.name: due tomorrow
